Currency.description: Payment and transaction currency as applicable on the selected CASA type

MinBalanceMaintenance.description: Minimum balance to be maintained by the account holder in XYZD

HandlingFees/Supplementary.description: Account handling fees applicable for products in XYZD excluding taxes per annum

OverdraftLimit.description: Limit offered by banks for the customer based on turnover and spending levels in XYZD per month

InterestRates.description: Interest payable on repayment of the loan amount

DepositRate.description: Interest rate applicable for deposits only

MinDepositAmount.description: Minimum one time deposit amount in XYZD
